name: M·威利斯

last_movies.title: 我与超人的冒险 第一季

introduction: M. Willis is a Los Angeles-based television writer and producer. As the daughter of two American expats, M. spent her childhood in Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates. She attended Tufts University with ambitions to return overseas as a diplomat or teacher. Around the same time, Ron Moore's re-imagined "Battlestar Galactica" premiered and M. fell in love with television.M. is an Executive Story Editor on the upcoming HBO Max/Cartoon Network animated show, "My Adventures With Superman."Before this, she was a writer on Paramount+'s "Star Trek: Lower Decks" and a clandestine live-action spin-off of "Star Trek: Discovery," Netflix's "She-Ra and the Princesses of Power" and "Jurassic World: Camp Cretaceous," and Fox's "The Exorcist." Other writing credits include work for Axis Studios and Spin Master.
